headline.main: Standard Life, Aberdeen Eye Deep Cost Cuts in 11 Billion-Pound Deal
headline.print_headline: Standard Life, Aberdeen Eye Deep Cost Cuts in 11 Billion-Pound Deal

lead_paragraph: Standard Life has reached agreement to buy Aberdeen Asset Management in an 11 billion-pound merger that should save 200 million pounds a year in costs, pushing rivals to follow suit as fund managers' margins sag.
snippet: Standard Life has reached agreement to buy Aberdeen Asset Management in an 11 billion-pound merger that should save 200 million pounds a year in costs, pushing rivals to follow suit as fund managers' margins sag....
